title.narrative: F.a: Project Addressing Problems Affecting Child-headed Homes

description.narrative: In the beginning of year 2000 the cuppermines as the main industry in the city Luanshya were closed and the area has disrepaired. Unemployment has resulted in major social problems, prostitution and eventually a great amount of orphans having diffuculties to cope with life. The goal is to give children and youth possibilities to cope in life as full and productive members of the society. This is done by supporting material and financial support for schooling, psychosocial guidance and free healthcare. Vocat ional school and training in entrepreneurship and agriculture gives income to the youth.The local partner is Serve Zambia Foundation, who's founder and leader Svenska babtistsamfundet have had relations with for a long time.
